title: Heat is no longer a problem with these fresh products from Xiaomi
text:
Summer finally arrived with high temperatures, surprising everyone in the central region of Chile, who has experienced year-end holidays with high temperatures. With this complicated situation for many people, it makes perfect sense to find out how Xiaomi products can make hot days more bearable.
From devices that keep you cool to smart solutions for your home, Xiaomi has a variety of products that will make dealing with the heat easier. These are designed to be economical and eco-friendly while being able to refresh the environment in an intelligent manner.
Refreshes your home from cover to cover
Mi Smart Standing Fan line of fans and humidifiers Xiaomi Smart Humidifier 2, These are the products that the brand has come up with for this summer. Thinking about the comfort and well-being of the family, by providing a refreshing, relaxing and relaxing environment.

On the one hand, there is smart fan Xiaomi, Mi Smart Standing Fan, Which is characterized by the brand’s classic minimalist design. With advanced technologies that allow greater wind capacity in an intelligent manner.
It has a 7-blade ventilation structure that provides adjustable wind up to 16 meters. Providing a natural breeze that simulates the irregular changes of the wind, creating a delicate and soft atmosphere. Likewise, due to its great power, it covers distance without loss of airflow. Plus, it’s extremely quiet, emitting only 26.6dB of noise, so you can quietly enjoy a nap or a good rest.
cooler and more comfortable environment
On the other hand, there is Xiaomi Smart Humidifier, Xiaomi Smart Humidifier 2, Which provides enough moisture in the space to make working, sleeping or living more comfortable during hot or dry summer days.
It is made from highly resistant antibacterial materials to provide greater protection to users. It features water sterilized by UVGI ultraviolet light, which purifies every drop of water to ensure safe and healthy humidification for everyone in the home. Furthermore, it has a 4.5 liter capacity water tank, which provides up to 16 hours of operation with the option to add essential oils for aromatherapy, making the room fresh and comfortable.
Both products can be controlled and configured by app Xiaomi Home As for smartphones, in addition to compatibility with Google Assistant and Alexa and can be found in all Mi Stores Chile and the Xiaomi online store as well as in the main retailers in the country.
